name: Cross-brained
description:
Inspired by the two games I had been playing, Battlerite & Nintendoland. I wanted to see how good humans could get at controlling two characters if they were mapped to the two analog sticks on a controller. Fairly simple mechanics otherwise conceptually.

Requires 2 controllers to play.

Controls:
Each stick controls a separate character. You can use the left and right triggers to dash with either character.
